response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a significant advantage over other potential buyers, ensuring you secure a piece that holds immense worth for you at a competitive rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only benefit from owning a valuable asset but also enjoy the peace of mind that comes with making a smart investment. Please let us know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
